tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
He is a role model for many upcoming doctors. 
Knows how to communicate well with his patients , explain the cause and also the mode of treatment. 

The best part is the time he spends on each patient to listen to them and examine them thoroughly makes it comfortable for the patient to feel at ease.

Very rarely you find once such Doctor with such kindness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Amazing doctor! He patiently hears the issues and gets to the root of the problem... This is the second time I am visiting Dr Kumar and the experience has been great... Thanks doc...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Doctor is excellent and amazing. He makes a note of all the symptoms and parameters from our existing reports carefully and keenly without rushing up. He will analyze the issue very carefully one by one and provide a proper answer. He prescribes the tests only which are most essential for the current problem. He doesn't prescribe them unnecessarily. I have never seen such a patient-doctor who is very economical. Big Salute to such doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Such a kind doctor. Very happy with the treatment. Very patient kind doctor. Definitely will recommend the doctor to everyone. Very happy
Experience is very very  good.He is a our family Doctor and taking care of our health issues since long.
